name: Less is More (Isometric 3D)
description:
WARNING: THE BROWSER VERSION OF THE GAME LAGS A LOT, SO I REMOVED SOME INTENSIVE PARTS OF THE GAME (e.g the smooth fog) 
Download the game for the best experience.

Woo! I have been working on this for like a whole month now, nonstop about 100 hours on this and I'm FINALLY DONE! 

This game is an Isometric version of the game Less is More (game on my profile) and this Isometric game also has a bunch more updates and cool features and you can play this game NOW!

Thanks :)
